titleStmt.title: Detection of Ed. Glouers hereticall confection lately contriued and proffered to the Church of England, vnder the name of A present preseruatiue. VVherein with the laying open of his impudent slander against our whole ministrie, the reader shal find a new built nest of old hatcht heresies discouered, (and by the grace of God) ouerthrowne: togither with an admonistion to the followers of Glouer and Browne. By Steph. Bredwell, student in phisicke. Seene and allowed.
titleStmt.author: Bredwell, Stephen.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Wolfe, and are to be sold by Edward White, dwelling at the signe of the Gunne at the little North doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 3598a on UMI microfilm reel 1266.
Leaves closely cropped at head, affecting running titles.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Gunne at the little North doore of Paules
